HideUIPanel(this:GetParent()); if ( GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc ) then GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc(GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.previousValues); end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");
GLDG_ShowHelpToolTip(this:GetName()) GameTooltip:Hide()
HideUIPanel(this:GetParent()); GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.func(); if ( GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.opacityFunc ) then GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.opacityFunc(); end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");

if ( GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.opacityFunc ) then GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.opacityFunc(); end
GLDG_ShowHelpToolTip(this:GetName()) GameTooltip:Hide()
if ( this.hasOpacity ) then GLDG_OpacitySliderFrame:Show(); GLDG_OpacitySliderFrame:SetValue(this.opacity); this:SetWidth(365); else GLDG_OpacitySliderFrame:Hide(); this:SetWidth(305); end
GLDG_ColorSwatch:SetTexture(arg1, arg2, arg3); if ( this.func ) then this.func(); end
if (arg1 == "ESCAPE") then HideUIPanel(this); if ( GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc ) then GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc(GLDG_ColorPickerFrame.previousValues); end end
